service_figures: INT. has over 26 years of experience in delivering software engineering solutions, serving more than 500 clients and completing over 11,000 client projects. The company has been recognized for its triple-digit revenue growth over three consecutive years and has received multiple awards for its digital transformation services. INT. has developed significant projects such as MyGov within three months to address urgent needs and provided dedicated teams for clients like Cipla to unify their operations. The company also employs advanced technology for solutions like counterfeit drug detection for Zuellig Pharma.
